nodes.text: The Kaliida Nebula was a nebula in space near the Naboo and Ryndellia star systems. Anakin Skywalker and his Shadow Squadron took a shortcut by passing through the Kaliida Nebula—where as the heavy cruiser Malevolence could not—and intercepted the Malevolence during the Clone Wars, preventing the Separatist Alliance's attack on the nearby Kaliida Shoals Medical Center.
Following the assault on the Mako-Ta Space Docks during the Galactic Civil War, a portion of the Alliance Fleet led by Admiral Gial Ackbar hid within the nebula.
